task_descriptions:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: `CustomerName@ride`
- Today is `Day@schedule`

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Find an apartment (prices are in 'credits')
- Schedule an apartment viewing 
- Calling a Taxi/Uber/Lyft ride 
- Checking the weather forecast in different Cities (e.g. `City-1@weather` or `City-2@weather`)
linear_guide: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'Find apartment', 'Schedule apartment viewing' and 'Calling a ride' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also ask the assistant to check the weather.
You may attempt to do some smalltalk with the AI Assistant at any time.
If you haven't yet, it's time to change topic. You can also go back and forth between topics.
If it makes sense, use some negations ('I don't want', or 'anything but ...', etc.)
Keep going :) - don't forget some smalltalk. Perhaps say something related to the first topic you talked about.
Keep going until you've covered all the topics ('Find apartment', 'Schedule apartment viewing' and 'Calling a ride'). The conversation should continue at least until the last instruction is given.
Almost there. A few more turns.
Ok, once you've touched on all the topics ('Find apartment', 'Schedule apartment viewing' and 'Calling a ride') and engaged in some smalltalk, you can bring the conversation to a natural close.
